Class Bitly

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.www.AbstractUrlShortener
      com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.www.Bitly
All Implemented Interfaces:
UrlShortener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Jmp
public class Bitly
extends AbstractUrlShortener

A UrlShortener that supports services powered by bit.ly. Now using version 3.0 of the API!

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii

          Constructs a new URL shortener using the specified login and API key, which will return short URLs in the default domain.
